module.name: activity_method
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a method by which an activity may be performed.
The Activity_method module provides a foundation for more detailed and specific specifications of how particular activities are to be performed.

inscope.li: identification and description of an activity method.

outscope.li:
description of activities;
This requirement is dealt with by the activity module.
assignment of an activity method to an activity that shall use it;
association of an activity method to a work request to represent a way to resolve the request.

uof.name: Activity_Method
uof.description: The Activity_Method UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of the method by which activities may be performed.
